MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: ms.assetid: FA25562A-FE62-4DFC-9084-6BD6EAD73636 title: Keep the UI thread responsive description: Users expect an app to remain responsive while it does computation, regardless of the type of machine.

LinkItem.internal_link_text: Call asynchronous APIs in C\# or Visual Basic
Call asynchronous APIs in C\# or Visual Basic

MarkdownBlockBase.code_block:
Public Class Example ' ... Private Async Sub NextMove-Click(ByVal sender As Object, ByVal e As RoutedEventArgs) Await Task.Run(Function() ComputeNextMove()) ' update the UI with results End Sub
Private Async Function ComputeNextMove() As Task ' ... End Function ' ... End Class
